nodes.text: The Frostflower Path was a roadway that ran along the coastline in the Alsakan Lowlands on the planet Alderaan, continuing from the Wooded Valley in the Apalis Coast to the west. The area was inhabited by creatures sich as nerfs, manka cats, bolraidas and flutterplumes. A small Republic medical post was located in the area during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. During the Alderaan Civil War troops loyal to House Thul patrolled parts of the area.
Frostflower Path first appeared in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a massivley multiplayer online roleplaying video game released by BioWare in 2011.
